body.name: PrimZooty Large Utensil Holder for Kitchen Counter - 11.8"x 6.7"x 4.7" Aesthetic Design, Anti-Slip Mat, 3 Compartments, Kitchen Utensil Holder Organizer
features: 【HOLDS 30 UTENSILS IN 3 COMPARTMENTS】Are you tired of rummaging through an overflowing kitchen drawer just to find the right utensils? If you have a ton of utensils, you definitely need this spacious utensil caddy. With 3 roomy compartments, this kitchen utensil organizer can hold at least 30 cooking utensils! Measures 11.8"x 6.7"x 4.7". SAY GOODBYE to squeezing your utensils together or jamming them inside drawers.

【NON-SLIP MAT & STABLE BAMBOO BASE】The Anti-Slip mat prevents the utensils from slipping. The sturdy metal material and premium thick bamboo base ensure that this utensil caddy stays in place without slipping or tipping. Weighing 1.42 lbs., this steel bamboo kitchen counter organizer provides excellent stability. Additionally, four non-slip pads on the base of this cooking utensil holder protect your countertop from scratches.

【VERSATILE USES】With its wide-opening wire design and solid bamboo base, this kitchen utensils holder offers a perfect platform for storing all your larger cooking utensils such as spatulas, ladles, whisks, tongs, servers, and turners. Maximize your countertop space with this convenient utensil organizer. Apart from kitchen utensil storage, this black utensil holder can also be used for storing cutlery, office supplies, craft supplies, and more.

【STURDY CONSTRUCTION, LASTS FOR YEARS】Crafted from rust-resistant steel and premium bamboo, this utensil holder for kitchen counter is built to withstand everyday use. Its heavy-duty construction ensures durability for years to come.

【MODERN FARMHOUSE KITCHEN DECOR】The Aesthetic metal wire design of this utensil organizer for countertop adds a decorative and functional touch to your home. The matte black finish complements any kitchen decor style, making it an excellent addition to your kitchen counter.

【Great Gift Idea & Hassle-Free Purchase】Aside from being a practical kitchen accessories for countertop storage solution, this farmhouse style metal and bamboo utensil caddy is also a perfect gift for any home chef or connoisseur of cooking. This cooking tool holder undergo 3 quality inspections before shipping, ensuring satisfaction for friends and family who love to cook. 【SERVICE】In case you are not satisfied with this extra large utensil holder upon receiving it, please feel free to contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My wife chose this holder & it does just what it says it will do! We have about 2 dozen kitchen cooking utensils, most of them large & long handled. This utensil holder holds them ALL. She was concerned that it might not be tall enough for the larger utensils since the advertised picture seems to show small pieces in the holder. But it holds them perfectly. She chose this rectangular holder over round ones because this shape would fit into our cramped counter space. Again, very happy that she did. We would highly recommend this product & would purchase it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We needed something to hold our large utencils badly. This is bigger than expected, but that ended up being a good thing. Looks nice on my counter and holds everything!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I wanted
reviews.reviewText: Good looking and veratile unit that holds a lot and fits nicely into our decor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lots of space
reviews.reviewText: Nice materials. Easy to assemble. Compact design fit well on my counter too. It fit quite a bit more utensils than the advertising stated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great For The BBQ!
reviews.reviewText: This is a well made sturdy utensil holder and a great addition to my kitchen and outdoor BBQ. There are many hungry wild critters where I live... and they are crafty opportunists. I cannot leave stuff out there for any extended periods of time. When cooking outdoors on the BBQ (all seasons) I have to transport utensils back and forth from the kitchen to the grill. Now I have a caddy, and it's a nice one! Bravo on this design. It's large enough for my BBQ needs and looks really nice to boot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great addition to my kitchen!
reviews.reviewText: I don’t want to say I’m a utensil hoarder but I do have a lot of kitchen utensils. I was looking for something that could hold more utensils but not take too much space and still match my kitchen aesthetic. This seemed like it and was a great choice for my kitchen!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Utensil Holder to Rule Them All
reviews.reviewText: After rotating through several utensil holders, we have a winner! This holder keeps all the utensils at the back of the counter space while still providing ample room for a wide variety of cooking apperati. There are two dividers to help with organization. There is also a liner for the bottom of the rack. This looks great and does a terrific job of handling our swiss-arm-knife (knife not included) collection of utensils, so they are right there when we need them. Wonderful

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Large Utensil Holder, But Unnecessary Silicone Matte
reviews.reviewText: I love this utensil holder because it holds way more than my last "pot" type design, and it's very stylish. However, I'm not sure what the included silicone matte is for, and I don't think it's necessary. I would recommend purchasing the design without it to save some money.Overall, I'm very happy with this utensil holder. It's a great way to keep my kitchen counter organized and stylish.Pros:Holds a lot of utensilsStylish designEasy to cleanCons:Silicone matte is unnecessary and adds to the costRecommendation:I recommend this utensil holder to anyone looking for a large and stylish way to organize their kitchen counter. Just be aware that the silicone matte is unnecessary and adds to the cost.
